message.body: Hey!!! So I was thinking of sending out an email for the surprise party...maybe tomorrow...is there anything you want me to include in email?? :)
Oh and are you around Thursday afternoon? Was thinking I could bring a few things over and maybe we could make pies??
Hey! Maybe just say people can come around back on Sansom Street? Sometimes it's hard to hear the doorbell if we are outside. But we could put a sign out too!
Thursday works for me! The earlier the better I have yoga at 6!
Cool! What time should I say? 8?
How about I come Thursday at around 1pm...
Both times are good!
Great! What should I bring over Thursday to make pies? i.e. any ingredients we need?
I'll double check but I think we need limes ( key limes preferribly but they are hard to find)
Oh and unsalted butter and extra eggs! I only have salted butter.
Ok cool! Oh and what's your address?
I drank a whole bottle of wine last have been in bed puking all day.
But I just ordered dominos so that should help.
Oh jeez!!!
Why you drink that whole bottle girl??
Tasted like juice.
Oh I understand
How was that dominos??
Just sent party email
Let me know what you think!! :)
It's great!!!
Good group if peeps!
Ok good! I tried to make it jazzy and fun!
Hey! Told Julian you guys invited us over for dinner Saturday night
Tell Hunter before he comes over to look at water heater!!
I said steaks!
I texted him!
I don't know if I communicated that clearly!
When does he come to look at the water heater?
Everything was cool :)
Haha he just left
Thanks so much for all your help with this party planning! You da best!!
Aw no prob! I don't feel like we've done much yet! Thursday will be the planning day!
